author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Scientists have confirmed that time on Mars passes faster than on Earth due to differences in gravitational fields and orbital mechanics explained by Einstein’s general relativity. Atomic clocks on Mars tick up to 226 microseconds faster daily, impacting future mission planning and interplanetary communication.

Source Article: https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-3881/ae0c16
